findings.details: Pagination now wraps with consistent gaps on small screens to avoid horizontal overflow.
Network restricted; external link availability not verified. Manual scan found no placeholder or http:// links in templates/pages/posts.
Core layouts include SEO tags, Open Graph defaults, and robots directives.
Pagination spacing adjusted for better tap targets on small screens.

recommendations: Run external link checks when network access is available
Monitor pagination on long blog archives to confirm no wrapping regressions
